headline: How Analyst Shifts and New Risks Are Changing the Story for Deckers Outdoor
summary: Deckers Outdoor recently saw its fair value estimate revised down modestly, from $129.28 to $126.77 per share, following the latest analyst updates. At the same time, the discount rate applied to the stock was nudged higher from 8.34% to 8.45%. Ongoing debates are highlighting both buoyant sales momentum and mounting competitive risks. Stay tuned to discover how you can stay informed as the outlook for Deckers evolves with new research and shifting market sentiment. What Wall Street Has Been...
